languages.text: "Ты так уповаешь на свою слепоту? Думаешь, она защитит тебя от ослепительного сияния истины?"
"Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"
languages.original_text: "Ты так уповаешь на свою слепоту? Думаешь, она защитит тебя от ослепительного сияния истины?"

traits.locale_text: "Is that how reliant you are on your blindness? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"
"Is that how reliant you are on your blindness? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"
"Is that how reliant you are on your blindness? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"
"Is that how reliant you are on your blindness? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"
"Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"
"Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

languages.text: "Klammert Ihr Euch derart verzweifelt an Eure Blindheit? Glaubt Ihr, sie beschützt Euch vor dem blendenden Glanz der Wahrheit?"
languages.original_text: "Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr derart abhängig von Eurer Blindheit? Glaubt Ihr, sie beschützt Euch vor dem blendenden Glanz der Wahrheit?"

languages.text: « À quoi bon vous raccrocher aussi désespérément à votre aveuglement ? Croyez-vous qu'il vous protégera de la lumière éblouissante de la vérité ? »
languages.original_text: "Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites confiance à votre aveuglement à ce point ? Croyez-vous qu'il vous protégera de la lumière éblouissante de la vérité ? »

languages.text: “你就如此相信你那目不视物的双眼吗？莫非你真的以为，它会保护你免受真理耀光的灼烧？”
languages.original_text: "Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

traits.locale_text: “你就如此相信你那目不视物的双眼吗？莫非你真的以为，它会保护你免受真理耀光的灼烧？”

languages.text: 「そんなに必死になって盲目にしがみついているのか？それで真実の目も眩む輝きから身を守れるとでも？」
languages.original_text: "Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうやって目を瞑れば何とかなると思っているのか？それで真実の目も眩む輝きから身を守れるとでも？」

languages.text: «¿Tanto te aferras a tu ceguera? ¿Crees que te protegerá del cegador resplandor de la verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Eres así de dependiente con tu ceguera? ¿Crees que te protegerá del cegador resplandor de la verdad?».

languages.text: "Can havliyle sarıldığın o körlüğünün, seni hakikatin göz kamaştıran ışığından koruyacağını mı sandın?"
languages.original_text: "Do you cling to your blindness so desperately? Do you think it will protect you from the blinding radiance of the truth?"

traits.locale_text: "Körlüğün bu kadar mı biçare ki iki elle sarılıyorsun? Bu çabanın, seni hakikatin göz alıcı ışığından koruyabileceğini mi sanıyorsun?"
